home.title: Welcome to Terrario
home.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Terrario app - manage your animal collection
home.addFirstAnimal: Add your first animal in the "My Animals" section

auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

lizards.name: Lizards
lizards.description: Geckos, agamas, chameleons and other lizards

snakes.name: Snakes
snakes.description: Pythons, corn snakes, boas and other snakes

frogs.name: Frogs
frogs.description: Tree frogs, dart frogs and other anurans

chacoGoldenKnee.name: Chaco Golden Knee
chacoGoldenKnee.description: Popular tarantula for beginners. Calm and easy to care for.

tigerRumpTarantula.name: Tiger Rump Tarantula
tigerRumpTarantula.description: Fast and active species for experienced keepers.

mexicanRedkneeTarantula.name: Mexican Redknee Tarantula
mexicanRedkneeTarantula.description: Beautiful tarantula with characteristic red knees.

curlyHairTarantula.name: Curly Hair Tarantula
curlyHairTarantula.description: Known for soft, curly hairs. Calm species.

salmonPinkBirdeater.name: Salmon Pink Birdeater
salmonPinkBirdeater.description: Large tarantula with beautiful coloration. Requires a large enclosure.

goliathBirdeater.name: Goliath Birdeater
goliathBirdeater.description: The world's largest tarantula. Requires specialized care.

goldenChacoTarantula.name: Golden Chaco Tarantula
goldenChacoTarantula.description: Beautiful tarantula with characteristic golden knees.

costaRicanZebraTarantula.name: Costa Rican Zebra Tarantula
costaRicanZebraTarantula.description: Tarantula with striped coloration resembling zebras.

purplePinkToeTarantula.name: Purple Pink Toe Tarantula
purplePinkToeTarantula.description: Beautiful arboreal tarantula with purple coloration.

pinkFootGoliathBirdeater.name: Pink Foot Goliath Birdeater
pinkFootGoliathBirdeater.description: Large tarantula similar to the goliath.

asianBeautyTarantula.name: Asian Beauty Tarantula
asianBeautyTarantula.description: Beautiful Asian tarantula with metallic sheen.

blackVelvetTarantula.name: Black Velvet Tarantula
blackVelvetTarantula.description: Completely black tarantula with velvet hair.

leopardGecko.name: Leopard Gecko
leopardGecko.description: The most popular lizard for beginners. Easy to care for.

crestedGecko.name: Crested Gecko
crestedGecko.description: Nocturnal species, does not require additional UV lighting.

beardedDragon.name: Bearded Dragon
beardedDragon.description: Friendly lizard, requires a large enclosure.

blueTongueSkink.name: Blue Tongue Skink
blueTongueSkink.description: Large, calm lizard with characteristic blue tongue.

tokayGecko.name: Tokay Gecko
tokayGecko.description: Large gecko with characteristic voice. Requires high humidity.

dayGecko.name: Day Gecko
dayGecko.description: Small gecko, ideal for small enclosures.

greenAnole.name: Green Anole
greenAnole.description: Small, active lizard. Easy to care for.

chineseWaterDragon.name: Chinese Water Dragon
chineseWaterDragon.description: Large agama, requires a large aquatic enclosure.

pantherChameleon.name: Panther Chameleon
pantherChameleon.description: Beautiful chameleon from Madagascar. Requires specialized care.

greenIguana.name: Green Iguana
greenIguana.description: Large iguana, requires a very large enclosure.

greenBasilisk.name: Green Basilisk
greenBasilisk.description: Known for ability to run on water. Requires a large enclosure.

steppeAgama.name: Steppe Agama
steppeAgama.description: Small agama, easy to care for.

cornSnake.name: Corn Snake
cornSnake.description: Ideal snake for beginners. Gentle and easy to care for.

honduranMilkSnake.name: Honduran Milk Snake
honduranMilkSnake.description: Colorful snake, easy to care for.

reticulatedPython.name: Reticulated Python
reticulatedPython.description: One of the world's largest snakes. Requires specialized care.

kingsnake.name: Kingsnake
kingsnake.description: Gentle snake, easy to care for.

redEyedTreeFrog.name: Red Eyed Tree Frog
redEyedTreeFrog.description: Beautiful arboreal frog with characteristic red eyes.

tinctoriusPoisonDartFrog.name: Tinctorius Poison Dart Frog
tinctoriusPoisonDartFrog.description: Small, colorful frogs. Requires a bioactive enclosure.

ornatePacmanFrog.name: Ornate Pacman Frog
ornatePacmanFrog.description: Large, terrestrial frog with big appetite.

caneToad.name: Cane Toad
caneToad.description: Large, hardy toad. Easy to care for.

goldenPoisonDartFrog.name: Golden Poison Dart Frog
goldenPoisonDartFrog.description: Highly poisonous frog. Requires specialized care.

mexicanAxolotl.name: Mexican Axolotl
mexicanAxolotl.description: Aquatic salamander, requires cold water aquarium.

redEaredSlider.name: Red-Eared Slider
redEaredSlider.description: Popular aquatic turtle, requires a large aquarium.

leopardTortoise.name: Leopard Tortoise
leopardTortoise.description: Large land tortoise, requires lots of space.

paintedTurtle.name: Painted Turtle
paintedTurtle.description: Small aquatic turtle from North America.

chineseStripeNeckedTurtle.name: Chinese Stripe-Necked Turtle
chineseStripeNeckedTurtle.description: Small aquatic turtle, popular in aquaristics.

leatherbackSeaTurtle.name: Leatherback Sea Turtle
leatherbackSeaTurtle.description: Largest sea turtle. Requires specialized care.
